document.full_text: oil prices surged the most in three weeks on friday, with brent jumping $4 a barrel to a 32-month high as a sinking dollar triggered a fresh rush of fund buying across the commodities spectrum.
document.title: brent surges $4 as dollar fall stirs commods funds
lines_and_colors: oil prices surged the most in three weeks on friday, with brent jumping $4 a barrel to a 32-month high as a sinking dollar triggered a fresh rush of fund buying across the commodities spectrum.
